SELECT C.CHANNEL_SERIAL_SEQ, T.FILE_ID, T.SEQ, T.WORK_DATE, T.SEVENPAY_ID, T.PLATFORM_ID, T.CARD_NO, T.RECEIVE_DATETIME, T.RETURN_DATETIME, T.TRANS_AMT, IFNULL((SELECT TYPE_NAME FROM BASE_TYPE WHERE TYPE_SORT = 'BUSINESS_TYPE' AND TYPE_CODE = T.TRANS_TYPE),T.TRANS_TYPE) TRANS_TYPE, IFNULL((SELECT TYPE_NAME FROM BASE_TYPE WHERE TYPE_SORT = 'TRANS_STATUS' AND TYPE_CODE = T.TRANS_STATUS),T.TRANS_STATUS) TRANS_STATUS, T.RESERVE, T.INST_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(T.INST_DATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS instDatetime FROM BAL_JGKJ_DATA_SOURCE T LEFT JOIN STCS.CLEAR_JGKJ_RECHARGE C ON T.SEVENPAY_ID = C.ID
AND C.CHANNEL_SERIAL_SEQ LIKE CONCAT('%',#{channelSerialSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND T.PLATFORM_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{platformId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND T.SEVENPAY_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sevenpayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND T.WORK_DATE = #{workDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY T.INST_DATETIME DESC
